languages.text: {n}Возвысив голос, Комиссар триумфально восклицает:{/n} "Император смотрит на нас! Не оплошаем под взором Его, соратники!"
{n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"
languages.original_text: {n}Возвысив голос, Комиссар триумфально восклицает:{/n} "Император смотрит на нас! Не оплошаем под взором Его, соратники!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching, my comrades! Let us not falter under His gaze!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: {n}政委提高了声音，发出了胜利的呼喊声。{/n}“帝皇在看着我们！愿祂的目光保佑我们绝不动摇！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: {n}政委提高了声音，发出了胜利的呼喊声。{/n}“帝皇在看着我们！愿祂的目光保佑我们绝不动摇！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは声を張り上げて猛々しく叫んだ。{/n}「皇帝が我々を見守っている！彼の目の前で挫けることのないよう、果敢に進め！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは声を張り上げて猛々しく叫んだ。{/n}「皇帝が我々を見守っている！彼の目の前で挫けることのないよう、果敢に進め！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: {n}El Comisario eleva la voz para gritar triunfalmente:{/n} «¡El Emperador nos observa! ¡No podemos flaquear bajo Su mirada!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario eleva la voz para gritar triunfalmente:{/n} «¡El Emperador nos observa! ¡No podemos flaquear bajo Su mirada!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

languages.text: « L'Empereur nous observe ! {n}hurle le commissaire d'une voix triomphale.{/n} Nous ne faiblirons pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur nous observe ! {n}hurle le commissaire d'une voix triomphale.{/n} Nous ne faiblirons pas ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar erhebt die Stimme und ruft triumphierend:{/n} "Der Imperator sieht zu! Lasst uns unter seinem Blick nicht wanken!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar erhebt die Stimme und ruft triumphierend:{/n} "Der Imperator sieht zu! Lasst uns unter seinem Blick nicht wanken!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: {n}Sesini yükselten Komiser, zafer kazanmış gibi bağırıyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi izliyor! Efendimizin bakışları üzerimizdeyken pes etmek yok!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar raises his voice and shouts triumphantly,{/n} "The Emperor is watching! Let us not falter under His gaze!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser sesini yükseltiyor ve zafer kazanmış gibi bağırıyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi izliyor! Onun bakışları üzerimizdeyken pes etmek yok!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake
